net.myorb.testing.squareRoot

Class AbstractTestingEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.myorb.testing.squareRoot.AbstractTestingEnvironment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BisectionMethod, NewtonRaphsonMethod, TaylorSeries

    public abstract class AbstractTestingEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
    common environment for testing SQRT algorithm implementations
    Author:
    Michael Druckman

      • perfectSquaresReductionFactor

        public double perfectSquaresReductionFactor(double x)
        use multiples of perfect squares to transform X to optimal range
        Parameters:
        x - value of X being transformed restricted to 0 LT X LT 1
        Returns:
        transformer for X such that 0.9 LT X*divisor^2 LT 1.1

      • alterDivisor

        public double alterDivisor(double x,
                           double divisor,
                           double using)
        reduction algoritm attempts to force X into range ABS (X - 1) LT 0.1 seeking the benefit of taking the power series terms down to ending with a multiplier of (0.1)^TERMS at worst
        Parameters:
        x - the value of X being reduced for improved convergence of SQRT series
        divisor - compiled product of adjustments up to this point
        using - attempt further adjustment using this
        Returns:
        new divisor having applied this attempt

        Returns:
